heading: HB08258
0: AN ACT REORGANIZING THE COMELEC OFFICES
principal-authors: DATOL, FRANCISCO JR. G.; MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA; BELMONTE, FELICIANO JR. ;
status: Pending with the Committee on SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS since 2018-09-20
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08258
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REORGANIZING THE COMELEC OFFICES
ABSTRACT : Aims to create certain field offices such as Regional Election Office, Provincial Election Office and five Administrative districts, such as North, South, East, Central and Manila District with corresponding officials and personnel. Reclassifies and upgrades plantilla positions in the COMELEC in accordance with the goal of achieving equal pay for equal work in government service.
ALIAS NAME : “An Act Reorganizing COMELEC Offices.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DATOL, FRANCISCO JR. G., MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA, BELMONTE, FELICIANO JR.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-18
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS ON 2018-09-20
